definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: Her inner male counterpart wrote the book on celebrating the body beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她内心对应的那个男性意向对展现外在美很在行。

sentences.english: All of phenomenology can be regarded as an unfolding of the idea of intentionality .
sentences.chinese: 所有的现象学都可以看作是意向性思想的延伸。

sentences.english: The non-conformance to intended usage requirement.
sentences.chinese: 不符合各种意向使用要求。

sentences.english: In the course of manifesting"the being", intention action constructs and manifests the object of intentionality .
sentences.chinese: 在显现是者的过程中，意识活动构造并凸现意向对象。

sentences.english: Would you like to wear jewelleries in the future?
sentences.chinese: 您将来会有佩戴的意向吗？

sentences.english: Analysis was based on intention-to-treat and the primary outcome measure was length of hospital stay.
sentences.chinese: 基于意向治疗进行分析，主要测定结果为住院时间。

sentences.english: A term sheet is a conditional offer.
sentences.chinese: 投资意向书是个有条件的要约。

sentences.english: In that situation your EOI would be removed from the Pool.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况下，你的意向书会从选择选池中被删除。

sentences.english: Buyer issues LOI along with NCND to the Seller.
sentences.chinese: 买方向卖方出具意向书和保密协议。

sentences.english: Can I send an old cover letter that I used at the last company?
sentences.chinese: 我能够寄去我上次应聘时用过的求职意向书吗？

sentences.english: It was well-meaning advice but it was polar opposite of the truth.
sentences.chinese: 这种建议的意向是好的，但却彻底背离了事实。

sentences.english: J. Seale has boldly improved the traditional theory of intentionality.
sentences.chinese: 塞尔对传统的意向性理论进行了大胆的改进。

sentences.english: Objective To know the intention of receiving medical treatment of the retirees in Fangguyuan community of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解北京芳古园社区离退休居民就医意向。

sentences.english: Contact us to disc uss the possibilities for cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 请与我们联系洽谈合作意向。

sentences.english: The overall quality of experience also had a statistically significant effect on post-consumer behavior.
sentences.chinese: 会员的服务整体评价与购后行为意向间有显著相关。

definition: to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
